title: Head-on | US double-standards on invasive wars need to be laid bare - Firstpost
content: Head-on | US double-standards on invasive wars need to be laid bare  FirstpostView Full coverage on Google News
description: The Russia-Ukraine war is an intra-Slav conflict, but remote controlled by Saxons in Washington and London. Their destructive capacity remains as unparalleled in the modern world as it was through history
